Row.Text: Well Met. I'm Simon Bolivar, El Libertador. Welcome to my greatest project: The Gran Colombia.
Greetings, I hope you can be an ally of our freedom. I'm Simon Bolivar, El Libertador, founder of the Gran Colombia.
My name is Simon Bolivar, El Libertador, though I prefer just being called a citizen. Will you aid us in the path of our freedom?
And the Gran Colombia, lies defeated. But the dreams of freedom will not perish!
So, it is the end of this dream... Let's hope justice manages to punish you eventually.
And so its come to this... I devoted my life to building this Gran Colombia, so know that this is not the end!.
Our people are now playing your Arpas and praising your Libertadores! We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Your people and my people are now very similar. We now share a culture and so you are called to join my Patria Grande!
